name: Make Way (tanvirfiji)
description:
Make way is a strategy based plat-former game which is in development for BrainJam March,2021.

Instruction - A & D for move and jump for space key. You can also drag the buttons into the game world use them as a shield, platform or doing a hyper-Jump

Asset Used: 
Utilities (Developed by us).
Platformer Fantasy SET1

Team - Ashtoy
